There are three games on this site! 'Flip one coin' will flip a coin and tell you the outcome (heads or tails). 'Flip multiple coins' will ask for a certain number of flips, and will flip that many coins and provide the results. 'Guess the result' will ask you to guess either heads or tails, then will say if you were correct or not.
